verses.verse: And there appeared<WG3700> a great<WG3173> wonder<WG4592> in heaven;<WG3772> a woman<WG1135> clothed<WG4016> with the sun,<WG2246> and the moon<WG4582> under<WG5270> her feet,<WG4228> and on her head<WG2776> a crown<WG4735> of twelve<WG1427> stars:<WG792>
And she being<WG2192> with child<WG1722> cried,<WG2896> travailing<WG5605> in birth,<WG5605> and pained<WG928> to be delivered.<WG5088>

And there appeared<WG3700> another<WG243> wonder<WG4592> in heaven;<WG3772> and behold<WG2400> a great<WG3173> red<WG4450> dragon,<WG1404> having<WG2192> seven<WG2033> heads<WG2776> and ten<WG1176> horns,<WG2768> and seven<WG2033> crowns<WG1238> on his heads.<WG2776>

And his tail<WG3769> drew<WG4951> the third<WG5154> part of the stars<WG792> of heaven,<WG3772> and did cast<WG906> them to the earth:<WG1093> and the dragon<WG1404> stood<WG2476> before<WG1799> the woman<WG1135> which<WG3588> was ready<WG3195> to be delivered,<WG5088> for to devour<WG2719> her child<WG5043> as soon<WG3752> as it was born.<WG5088>

And she brought<WG5088> forth<WG5088> a man<WG730> child,<WG5207> who<WG3739> was to rule<WG4165> all<WG3956> nations<WG1484> with a rod<WG4464> of iron:<WG4603> and her child<WG5043> was caught<WG726> up to God,<WG2316> and to his throne.<WG2362>

And the woman<WG1135> fled<WG5343> into<WG1519> the wilderness,<WG2048> where<WG3699> she has<WG2192> a place<WG5117> prepared<WG2090> of God,<WG2316> that they should feed<WG5142> her there<WG1563> a thousand<WG5507> two<WG1417> hundred<WG1250> and three score<WG1835> days.<WG2250>
And there was war<WG4171> in heaven:<WG3772> Michael<WG3413> and his angels<WG32> fought<WG4170> against<WG2596> the dragon;<WG1404> and the dragon<WG1404> fought<WG4170> and his angels,<WG32>
And prevailed<WG2480> not; neither<WG3777> was their place<WG5117> found<WG2147> any<WG2089> more<WG2089> in heaven.<WG3772>

And the great<WG3173> dragon<WG1404> was cast<WG906> out, that old<WG744> serpent,<WG3789> called<WG2564> the Devil,<WG1228> and Satan,<WG4567> which<WG3588> deceives<WG4105> the whole<WG3650> world:<WG3625> he was cast<WG906> out into<WG1519> the earth,<WG1093> and his angels<WG32> were cast<WG906> out with him.

And I heard<WG191> a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> saying<WG3004> in heaven,<WG3772> Now<WG737> is come<WG1096> salvation,<WG4991> and strength,<WG1411> and the kingdom<WG932> of our God,<WG2316> and the power<WG1849> of his Christ:<WG5547> for the accuser<WG2725> of our brothers<WG80> is cast<WG2598> down,<WG2598> which<WG3588> accused<WG2723> them before<WG1799> our God<WG2316> day<WG2250> and night.<WG3571>
And they overcame<WG3528> him by the blood<WG129> of the Lamb,<WG721> and by the word<WG3056> of their testimony;<WG3141> and they loved<WG25> not their lives<WG5590> to the death.<WG2288>

Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> rejoice,<WG2165> you heavens,<WG3772> and you that dwell<WG4637> in them. Woe<WG3759> to the inhabitants<WG2730> of the earth<WG1093> and of the sea!<WG2281> for the devil<WG1228> is come<WG2597> down<WG2597> to you, having<WG2192> great<WG3173> wrath,<WG2372> because he knows<WG1492> that he has<WG2192> but a short<WG3641> time.<WG2540>
And when<WG3753> the dragon<WG1404> saw<WG1492> that he was cast<WG906> to the earth,<WG1093> he persecuted<WG1377> the woman<WG1135> which<WG3748> brought<WG5088> forth<WG5088> the man<WG730> child.

And to the woman<WG1135> were given<WG1325> two<WG1417> wings<WG4420> of a great<WG3173> eagle,<WG105> that she might fly<WG4072> into<WG1519> the wilderness,<WG2048> into<WG1519> her place,<WG5117> where<WG3699> she is nourished<WG5142> for a time,<WG2540> and times,<WG2540> and half<WG2255> a time,<WG2540> from the face<WG4383> of the serpent.<WG3789>

And the serpent<WG3789> cast<WG906> out of his mouth<WG4750> water<WG5204> as a flood<WG4215> after<WG3694> the woman,<WG1135> that he might cause<WG4160> her to be carried<WG4216> away of the flood.<WG4216>

And the earth<WG1093> helped<WG997> the woman,<WG1135> and the earth<WG1093> opened<WG455> her mouth,<WG4750> and swallowed<WG2666> up the flood<WG4215> which<WG3739> the dragon<WG1404> cast<WG906> out of his mouth.<WG4750>

And the dragon<WG1404> was wroth<WG3710> with the woman,<WG1135> and went<WG565> to make<WG4160> war<WG4171> with the remnant<WG3062> of her seed,<WG4690> which<WG3588> keep<WG5083> the commandments<WG1785> of God,<WG2316> and have<WG2192> the testimony<WG3141> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
